actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to promote the development of Indian arts and crafts and to create a board to assist therein."

summary.text: Authorizes the Indian Arts and Crafts Board of the Department of the Interior to make loans and grants to Indian museums for operational expenses and for management personnel and support expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to promote the development of Indian arts and crafts and to create a board to assist therein."
